title: Backendutvecklare (PHP, Wordpress)
description:
AcadeMedia söker en PHP backendutvecklare som trivs bäst när fokus ligger på logik, struktur och smarta lösningar bakom kulisserna. Hos oss blir du en viktig del av teamet bakom våra webbplattformar, med möjlighet att påverka arkitektur, utvecklingsmetoder och ett samhällsnyttigt uppdrag inom utbildning.

 **Ditt uppdrag**

  

I rollen som backendutvecklare kommer du främst att arbeta med:

* Att vidareutveckla och underhålla våra WordPress-baserade system, inklusive specialutvecklade teman och plugins.
* Att skriva robust och strukturerad PHP-kod samt säkerställa skalbara lösningar.
* Att vara med och forma arkitekturen i våra egna plugins, komponenter och interna bibliotek.
* Att samarbeta med frontendutvecklare, designers och projektledare i ett agilt team.

  

Du kan också, om du vill och har intresse, bidra inom områden som:

* CI/CD-flöden i GitLab
* Docker-baserade utvecklingsmiljöer
* Laravel-applikationer
* Systemarkitektur och förbättring av arbetsflöden

 **Din profil**

  

Du är en utvecklare som gillar backendfokus, struktur och kvalitet. Vi tror att du har:

* Flera års professionell erfarenhet av PHP-utveckling.
* Mycket god kunskap i WordPress, särskilt inom pluginutveckling, ACF och moderna WordPress-metoder som Gutenberg-block och gällande best practices.
* God förståelse för Git och moderna utvecklingsmetoder.
* Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och tillsammans med andra i agila team.
* Kommunikation på svenska eller engelska utan problem.

  

Meriterande:

* Erfarenhet av Laravel
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD eller Docker
* Erfarenhet av Linux, SSH eller servermiljöer

 **Vem är du som person?**

  

För att lyckas i den här rollen behöver du arbeta strukturerat och samtidigt kunna anpassa dig när prioriteringar förändras. Du har gedigen erfarenhet av backendutveckling, särskilt inom WordPress och PHP, och du trivs med att skapa smarta och långsiktiga lösningar. Du är nyfiken, kvalitetsmedveten och drivs av att förbättra både kod och arbetssätt, liksom samarbetet i teamet. Du känner dig trygg med moderna utvecklingsmetoder och verktyg och bidrar gärna till att höja nivån runt dig.


Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning.


AcadeMedia drivs av människor som arbetar för att skapa ett bättre och mer hållbart samhälle, med utbildning och lärande som grund. Vår vision är att leda utvecklingen av framtidens utbildning och tillsammans rustar vi våra barn, elever och vuxenstuderande med kunskaper och bildning samtidigt som vi ger dem förutsättningar att kunna forma sin egen framtid. Vi är övertygade om att utbildning kan skapa förändring på riktigt, både för enskilda individer och för hela samhällen – vi kallar det ”Utbildning som förändrar”.

**Ansökan**  

Välkommen att skicka in dina ansökningshandlingar innehållande CV och personligt brev där du motiverar varför du söker dig till just denna tjänst. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse.


Vid frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Louise Björk, Chef AcadeMedia Inhouse


louise.bjork@academedia.se


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Co-founder / Founding Fullstack Developer (Node.js) - Studyverse
description:
***Studyverse – where balance builds brilliance***

**Turn stress into structure by studying smarter, not harder.**

Students at top universities like KTH, Oxford, or Harvard push themselves to excel — facing expectations from both themselves and others. In pursuit of high goals, many end up setting standards so extreme that the body reacts with stress: either by procrastinating before the work even begins, or by collapsing into burnout afterward, and when they try to cope they often jump between countless productivity apps and wellness tools — but few, if any, combine both performance and well-being in one place.

**Studyverse is changing that.**

We're building an **AI-powered study ecosystem** that unites productivity, learning, and well-being into a single experience.  
A calendar that keeps track of your habits and warns you of potential burn out or procrastination.  
An AI that will assist by suggesting subgoals to overwhelming tasks as well as organizes flashcards according to relevance based on users feedback streamlining the study process.  
A study timer that encourages commitment through fun and creative user interface.  
An exam question organization tool that groups similar questions across several exams together as well as exam analyzation that recognizes frequently occurring topics, key points across papers and recommends an appropriate course of action for study.  
**Everything is connected, adapting to how you feel and how you perform.**

We believe in one simple truth: **Health is the foundation of performance.**

Studyverse is still at an **early-stage**, and things are moving fast — but the opportunity to shape something meaningful is huge.

**ABOUT STUDYVERSE**

Studyverse is a **KTH Innovation–connected startup** developing a digital study companion that helps students find balance, focus, and joy in their learning. Our mission is to help learners worldwide achieve academic success **without sacrificing their well-being.**

The global **EdTech market** is valued at over **$400 billion**, yet few tools bridge the gap between performance and mental health — this is where **Studyverse makes a difference.**

By combining **AI-driven insights, motivational design, and smart study tools**, we're transforming how students approach learning and long-term success.

**WHAT WE HAVE ACCOMPLISHED**

* Built a functional prototype.
* Gained the support of **Björn Liljeqvist** – Mensa chairman and renowned study-technique expert – who plans to promote the platform once completed.
* Developed core features: smart calendar, analytics dashboard, goal tracking, flashcards, AI-based insights, and mock exams.
* Partnered with **KTH Innovation** for early-stage guidance and strategy.
* Started receiving feedback from the first group of early access testers.
* Showcased at **Armada**, KTH's largest career fair.

**YOUR ROLE — FOUNDING FULLSTACK ENGINEER**

As a founding developer, you will be responsible for shaping the technical foundation of Studyverse from the ground up.

You will:

* Build and scale core features in Node.js, TypeScript, React, and Next.js
* Design architecture, APIs, database structures, and deployment pipelines
* Work closely with the design, AI, and product founders to define product direction
* Prototype, iterate based on user feedback, and help us find product–market fit

This role is ideal for someone who enjoys ownership, loves solving real problems, and wants to build something meaningful from the earliest stage.

**THE JOURNEY AHEAD**

We are preparing for MVP launch and deeper user testing. You'll be directly involved in building:

* Smart reminders & advanced focus-blocking tools
* Improved app performance & animations
* Audio features in the file bank
* More advanced analytics & AI-driven coaching
* Experiments around pricing, onboarding, and product–market fit

This is the moment where your decisions will shape the future of the product.

**WHAT WE OFFER**

As a co-founder, you'll gain **real ownership and influence** — both technically and strategically.

We offer:

* **Equity-based compensation at the start**
* Possibility of salary once funding is secured
* Flexible hours (typically **10–20h/week** until funding, then scaled)
* A chance to build something impactful in EdTech with global potential
* Creative freedom, rapid learning, and a highly collaborative team

This is a rare opportunity to join early, when your code and ideas still shape the entire product.

Skills & Requirements

You have experience with — or strong motivation to learn — the technologies we use:

* Node.js, JavaScript/TypeScript
* React + Next.js
* Supabase & SQL
* Git and modern frontend workflows (Tailwind CSS)
* Fluent in Swedish or English

We'd love if you:

* Enjoy solving real user problems
* Are proactive, curious, and not afraid to try new things
* Appreciate clean design, good user experience, or AI-driven features
* Have interest in learning, productivity, or student well-being

You **don't need to match every skill** — we value mindset, drive, and willingness to grow.

**WHY JOIN**

Because this isn't just another productivity app — **it's a movement** toward healthier, more sustainable learning worldwide.

At Studyverse, you'll join a small team with backgrounds in engineering physics, AI, and UX. We value:

* Open, honest communication
* Fast iteration and data-driven decisions
* Supportive and balanced working culture
* Ownership, autonomy, and shared responsibility

If you're excited by the idea of building a product that helps thousands of students thrive — we'd love to hear from you.

Job Types: Part-time, Permanent

Expected hours: No more than 15 per week

Work Location: Hybrid remote in 114 28 Stockholm

title: Senior Backend Software Developer (Full-time)
description:
*At Nexus, part of French IN Groupe, we secure the new society that emerges in the ever-expanding world of digital transformation. By challenging ourselves to go further and do better, we’re developing technology for high-demand global clients. Nexus’ Smart ID solutions and IoT platforms are changing how we perceive trusted identities. Do you want to be a part of our journey?*
 Our Head of GO Cards Cédric and his team are looking for a Senior Backend Software Developer to join our Stockholm office. This role is ideal for someone experienced who wants to deliver real impact today while preparing to take on more responsibility in the future.
   

  

**What We Offer You**
* Impactful work: Your code directly powers secure identity services used by real customers worldwide.
* A pragmatic environment: We value smart choices over shiny tools. You'll use the most adapted technologies to solve problems, reduce complexity, and limit future technical debt.
* A healthy team culture: We believe in humility, collaboration, and keeping team well-being in balance with delivery goals.
* End-to-end responsibility: You'll see the whole lifecycle, from development through deployment to customer use.
* Growth into leadership: Over time, you'll have the opportunity to take on a bigger role in driving initiatives and supporting others in the team.


 Want to know more? Check out our value proposition: To work with us!
   

  

**What You’ll Do At Nexus**
 You will join Nexus GO Cards team, our online service that lets customers order secure and customized identity cards (smart cards), key fobs, and accessories. Customers can order via our card management portal or integrate directly through our APIs.
   

  

**In This Role, You Will**
* Focus on backend development, with responsibility for services, databases, and system integrations.
* Develop, improve, and maintain services with a strong focus on reliability, scalability, and long-term maintainability.
* Select and use technologies based on problem-solving value, not trendiness.
* Ensure that deliveries are on time and secure, always balancing speed with quality.
* Collaborate closely with teammates and stakeholders, enabling fast and sustainable delivery.
* Over time, take a leading role in driving improvements in both technology and ways of working.


**Some Of Our Tech Stack**
* Java (primary language: deep expertise required)
* Spring Boot
* REST, Microservices, Databases
* Azure (cloud environment), Docker, Kubernetes


**About You**
* Highly experienced in backend Java development and proficient with Azure.
* Results-oriented: you deliver what is needed, when it is needed.
* Pragmatic: you enjoy new technology but choose what best solves the current problem while limiting technical debt.
* Humble and grounded: you listen, collaborate, and keep the team's health in mind.
* Independent yet collaborative: you take initiative but thrive in teamwork.
* User-focused: the end user's experience is always your guiding star.


**Qualifications**
* Extensive experience in Java backend development is required.
* 2+ years of experience with Azure DevOps is a must.
* Professional proficiency in English.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with Spring Boot and modern development practices is a plus.
* Solid understanding of Microservices and integrations is an advantage.
* Experience with cloud environments (Azure, Docker, Kubernetes).
* Cybersecurity knowledge.


**Not sure you meet 100% of the qualifications?**
 At Nexus, we understand that experience comes in many forms. We’re dedicated to adding new perspectives to the team - so if your experience is this close to what we’re looking for, please consider applying.
   

  

**Background check**
 Transparency, security, and trust are the core of our company; therefore, the final candidate will be subjected to a background check before training.
   

  

 Nexus is an equal-opportunity employer. We truly believe in being ONE Nexus. You are welcomed at Nexus for who you are, no matter where you come from or what you look like. Our technology is for everyone, and so is our workplace. So, bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background to thrive, collaborate, and be forward-thinking! It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep innovating the way we secure the world.
   

  

**Joining Nexus** 
 means becoming a part of IN Groupe, an international group of around 2000 employees on five continents.
   

  

 IN Groupe and Nexus are here to protect the identities of people and things making life both safer and simpler.
   

  

 The group meets the needs of states, businesses, and hundreds of millions of users in Europe and throughout the world.
   

  

 We provide the best of technology and innovation, in a sustainable manner, now and for future generations.
   

  

 At Nexus we believe transparency is a prerequisite for trust and therefore all our
 **products and services are documented online.**

title: Tools Developer - Hole.io
description:
**About Voodoo**
 Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.
   

  

 This position is fully remote within CET ±3h.
   

  

 Team
   

  

 Our Gaming team is made up of hybrid-casual, casual, and mid-core experts. Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing, and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.
   

  

 Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient hybrid games generating more than $20m per year, we are the world's largest and most successful hybrid publisher.
   

  

 Voodoo is creating a small experimentation team with a big mission: find the next best way to entertain the world by taking our best hits to a new level.
   

  

 You will be joining one of our Live Studios, working on
 **Hole.io** 
**.**
 Role
   

  

 We are looking for a talented Tools Developer with a strong understanding of the mobile game development pipeline to help our teams deliver fun, innovative, and entertaining games. You will design, build, and maintain the essential tools and systems that our game teams (developers, designers, artists, and QA) use every day.
   

  

* Develop and maintain robust, high-quality tools supporting multiple disciplines, including game design, art, engineering, and QA.
* Write clean, efficient, and scalable code in C# and other scripting languages.
* Support and improve our CI/CD pipelines and automation processes.
* Collaborate with Game Designers, Tech Artists, Engineers, and QA to identify bottlenecks and create tools to solve them.
* Support and contribute new ideas to improve team workflows and efficiency.


 With this role, you will have a strong impact on the company by contributing daily to important decisions with a senior, multidisciplinary team of passionate and talented people. Thanks to your creativity and your teamwork, you will help us entertain millions of people by empowering our game studios across all disciplines.
   

  

 Profile
   

  

* Experience: 5+ years as a Developer in the mobile gaming industry or adjacent
* A creative and hacker mindset.
* Advanced proficiency in C#.
* Proficiency in at least one other scripting language (e.g., Python, Lua).
* Experience in developing tools, editor extensions (e.g., for Unity), and automation scripts.
* A good understanding of interdisciplinary game development workflows and pipelines (design, art, engineering, QA).
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, Gitlab CI) would be a plus.
* Experience with backend technologies would be a plus.
* Skilled in identifying performance bottlenecks and implementing optimizations.
* Good sense of user experience (for internal tools) and special attention to details.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to gather requirements from and explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders (Designers, Artists, QA).


**Benefits**
* Best-in-class compensation
* Other benefits according to the country you reside

title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
Är du sugen på en ny utmaning där du får använda din kompetens inom .NET, C#, React och TypeScript för att bygga skräddarsydda IT-lösningar som gör verklig skillnad? Då kan detta vara rätt utmaning för dig.
   

  

 Vi söker fullstackutvecklare med gedigen kompetens inom antingen .NET/C# eller Java, kombinerat med React och Typescript på frontend-sidan.
   

  

**Vi tror på utvecklare som omfamnar framtiden!**
 Det innebär att du inte bara vet hur bra kod ska göras, utan också är nyfiken på och skicklig i att använda moderna AI-verktyg som Cursor, Roo Code, Copilot och liknande. För dig är inte dessa verktyg ett komplement, de är en naturlig del av hur du orkestrerar agenter att utföra uppgifter åt dig för att arbeta smartare, snabbare och mer kreativt.
   

  

**Vad gör vi?**
 Vi på Decerno är specialister på skräddarsydda digitala lösningar och är stolta över att våra uppdrag bidrar till samhällsnytta.
   

  

 Det betyder att vi förstår att alla kunder är olika och har unika förutsättningar. Vi skräddarsyr våra lösningar utefter kundens behov vilket medför att våra medarbetare får möjlighet att arbeta i varierande och spännande projekt med olika tekniker.
   

  

 Samtidigt som vi skapar digitala lösningar vill vi också göra skillnad på riktigt. Det är inte bara något vi säger, vi menar det! Sedan vår start 1984 har vår etiska policy varit vår kompass och vi väljer aktivt bort projekt inom vapenindustri, spel, tobak och alkohol.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som utvecklare hos oss kommer får du en varierad vardag och möjlighet att jobba inom (men inte uteslutande med) utveckling främst i React, .NET/C#, Java, SQL eller Azure.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid att bemanna våra projekt med Decernos egna anställda och tillsammans delar ni med er av olika erfarenheter och hjälper varandra genom projektets alla faser.
   

  

 Placeringen är i Stockholm eller Göteborg och vi erbjuder en hybrid arbetsform. Vi tror på att kunna erbjuda våra medarbetare flexibilitet och möjligheten att balansera egna behov och förutsättningar med projektets krav. För den som är placerad i Göteborg kan resor till Stockholm förekomma. Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med sex månaders provanställning.
   

  

**Är det här du?**
* Du har minst tre års erfarenhet av C#/.NET eller Java
* Du har minst tre års erfarenhet av React eller något annat modernt JavaScript-ramverk, gärna med god vana av TypeScript
* Har ett genuint intresse för AI och LLM-teknologier, och aktivt följer med i vad som händer på området
* Är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och älskar att utforska hur AI-drivna verktyg kan lyfta ditt arbete till nästa nivå
* Du är flytande i svenska i såväl tal som skrift


 Det är meriterande om du har tidigare erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med Azure, DevOps, integrationer, .NET web API, CSS, AI eller maskininlärning.
   

  

**Därför ska du välja** 
**Decerno**
 I våra medarbetarundersökningar blir det gång på gång tydligt att det är de fantastiska kollegorna, de roliga och utmanande projekten och möjligheten att kunna bidra till samhällsnytta som gör att våra medarbetare trivs så bra på Decerno.
   

  

 Sedan finns det också några ytterligare aspekter vilka vi ser som självklarheter:
   

  

* En flexibel arbetsplats med större frihet att planera vardagen för att få arbete och privatliv att gå ihop
* Extra föräldraförmåner eftersom vi tycker att familjen är viktigast
* Vi tycker att din kompetensutveckling är viktig! Därför anordnar vi interna utbildningar löpande i vår egen Dec Academy, gör satsningar inom AI, håller i bokcirklar och arrangerar årliga konferenser
* Vi vill att du ska må bra, trivas och ha roligt på arbetet och därför arrangerar vi regelbundet olika sociala aktiviteter, utmaningar och hälsotävlingar – såväl virtuellt som på plats


 Utöver detta erbjuder vi även ett brett förmånspaket som inkluderar bland annat friskvårdsbidrag och ett generöst försäkringspaket. Vi berättar gärna mer om du vill veta vad mer vi på Decerno skulle kunna erbjuda dig.
   

  

**Låter detta som ditt nästa steg i karriären?** 
  

  

 Vad kul! Då ser vi fram emot att läsa din ansökan så snart som möjligt.

title: Industry Business Analyst
description:
To strengthen our development organization, we’re looking for a strategic and industry-savvy Business Analyst with hands-on knowledge from sectors such as Fashion, Food & Beverage, Distribution, Discrete or Process Manufacturing, This is an excellent opportunity for someone who understands ERP from both a business and technology perspective—and is ready to make an impact at the core of product innovation.
   

 This role also offers an exciting path for those who’ve worked closely with ERP solutions in customer or consulting settings and are ready to contribute directly to product development.
   

  

 Your Role:
   

 As an Industry Business Analyst, you’ll represent the voice of the industry inside Product Development. Working in close partnership with the Industry Product Manager, you’ll help shape the product roadmap and ensure that features are developed in alignment with real-world industry needs.
   

 You’ll act as Product Owner in agile teams, clarify requirements, define use cases, and ensure development output remains industry-relevant and customer-centric. You’ll also lead or participate in select customer engagements to gather insights that directly inform our product strategy.
   

 This is a key role where your industry knowledge, structured thinking, and communication skills will bridge the gap between market needs and development execution.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

 •Serve as an industry expert within Product Development
   

 •Contribute to roadmap preparation through research and industry analysis, taking the road map into development plan
   

 •Break down complex business problems into clear, actionable requirements
   

 •Capture, document, and prioritize use cases and features
   

 •Define high-level solution designs aligned with industry standards
   

 •Own and manage the product backlog in agile teams
   

 •Act as a customer advocate in development discussions
   

 •Stay current on Infor technologies and industry trends
   

 •Support innovation initiatives around GenAI/ML with Industry competence and use cases
   

 •Create Industry use cases for content, like Widgets, Process Catalogs, Persona based Workspaces and Composite Applications
   

  

 Who You Are:
   

 •Industry experience in Fashion, Food & Beverage, Distribution, Discrete or Process Manufacturing
   

 •Knowledge of Infor M3 would be valued and/or ERP implementation experience
   

 •Skilled at analyzing business needs and translating them into technical solutions
   

 •Effective communicator, both in writing and in presentations
   

 •Experienced working in customer-facing roles
   

 •Self-motivated with strong time management and problem-solving skills
   

 •Comfortable balancing business insight with technical depth
   

 •Fluent in Swedish and English - speaking and writing
   

  

 If you have experience working closely with ERP solutions—particularly within consulting or as key user within the relevant Industries, this could be the ideal next step in your career. Join us in shaping the future of industry-driven software.
   

  

 About Infor
   

  

 Infor is where ambition meets impact. Join a global community of bold thinkers and innovators, where your expertise doesn’t just solve problems. it shapes industries, unlocks opportunities, and creates real-world impact for billions of people. At Infor, you’re not just building a career. you’re helping to build what’s next.
   

  

 Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation.
   

  

 For more information visit [1] www.infor.com
   

  

  

 References
   

  

 Visible links
   

 1. https://www.infor.com/
   

  

 Our Values
   

  

 At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called [1] Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization.

Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.

title: Tools Developer - Hole.io
description:
**About Voodoo**
 Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.
   

  

 This position is fully remote within CET ±3h.
   

  

 Team
   

  

 Our Gaming team is made up of hybrid-casual, casual, and mid-core experts. Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing, and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.
   

  

 Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient hybrid games generating more than $20m per year, we are the world's largest and most successful hybrid publisher.
   

  

 Voodoo is creating a small experimentation team with a big mission: find the next best way to entertain the world by taking our best hits to a new level.
   

  

 You will be joining one of our Live Studios, working on
 **Hole.io** 
**.**
 Role
   

  

 We are looking for a talented Tools Developer with a strong understanding of the mobile game development pipeline to help our teams deliver fun, innovative, and entertaining games. You will design, build, and maintain the essential tools and systems that our game teams (developers, designers, artists, and QA) use every day.
   

  

* Develop and maintain robust, high-quality tools supporting multiple disciplines, including game design, art, engineering, and QA.
* Write clean, efficient, and scalable code in C# and other scripting languages.
* Support and improve our CI/CD pipelines and automation processes.
* Collaborate with Game Designers, Tech Artists, Engineers, and QA to identify bottlenecks and create tools to solve them.
* Support and contribute new ideas to improve team workflows and efficiency.


 With this role, you will have a strong impact on the company by contributing daily to important decisions with a senior, multidisciplinary team of passionate and talented people. Thanks to your creativity and your teamwork, you will help us entertain millions of people by empowering our game studios across all disciplines.
   

  

 Profile
   

  

* Experience: 5+ years as a Developer in the mobile gaming industry or adjacent
* A creative and hacker mindset.
* Advanced proficiency in C#.
* Proficiency in at least one other scripting language (e.g., Python, Lua).
* Experience in developing tools, editor extensions (e.g., for Unity), and automation scripts.
* A good understanding of interdisciplinary game development workflows and pipelines (design, art, engineering, QA).
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, Gitlab CI) would be a plus.
* Experience with backend technologies would be a plus.
* Skilled in identifying performance bottlenecks and implementing optimizations.
* Good sense of user experience (for internal tools) and special attention to details.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to gather requirements from and explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders (Designers, Artists, QA).


**Benefits**
* Best-in-class compensation
* Other benefits according to the country you reside

title: Teknisk IT Specialist.
description:
Beskrivning av uppdraget som Teknisk IT Specialist
  
IT-avdelningen (IT) ansvarar för vår kunds design, utveckling och förvaltning av deras digitala tjänster för att bidra till en attraktiv och hållbar kollektivtrafik.
  
Rollen som Teknisk IT specialist inom affärsområdet är den centrala tekniska kontaktytan mot IT-leverantörer och interna intressenter för förmågeområdet.
  
I rollen agerar du teknisk expert i såväl den dagliga förvaltningen som i utvecklingsinitiativ och är avgörande för att säkerställa en stabil, säker och kostnadseffektiv IT-miljö över tid.
  
Tjänsten fungerar som en teknisk brygga mellan verksamhetens behov och den levererade IT-lösningen, med ett djupt ansvar för att systemlandskapet är hållbart och väl underhållet.
  
  

**I uppdraget ingår arbetsuppgifter så som:**  

Svara för att de tjänster som finns inom området levereras i enlighet med överenskomna servicenivåer och säkerställa att områdets tjänster livscykel hanteras enligt plan
  
Följer upp ändringar samt ansvarar för release och incidenthantering i områdets tjänster
  
Ansvarar för att hantera komplex felsökning i de passersystem som hanteras inom området och ser till att felen avhjälps tillsammans med övriga i teamet eller extern leverantör
  
Ser till att erforderlig teknisk dokumentation, operativa rutiner och instruktioner finns tillgängliga
  
Ansvarar för att löpande följa upp och driva progress på godkända åtgärder i förvaltningsplaner och rapportera status och avvikelser
  
Att uppföljning och leverantörssamverkan sker enligt plan
  
Att erforderliga upphandlingar och avtal för tjänster inom området sker
  
Tar fram och säkerställer budget och prognos för området
  
Ansvarar för att hantera ekonomiskt underlag, såsom fakturering, prognos och budgetarbete
  
  

**Skallkrav:**  

Skall ha minst fyra (4) års erfarenhet i rollen som IT-förvaltare, IT-specialist med fokus på förvaltning och teknisk support av IT-tjänster kopplat till passersystem.
  
Minst tre (3) års dokumenterad erfarenhet av förvaltning av IT-tjänster enligt ITIL-processer, exempelvis incident-, problem-, ändrings- och releasehantering. Alternativt kan motsvarande erfarenhet från andra etablerade ramverk för IT-tjänsteförvaltning accepteras.
  
Minst tre (3) års dokumenterad operativ erfarenhet av förvaltning och vidmakthållande av IT-tjänster. Erfarenheten ska inkludera livscykelhantering av servermiljöer (Windows Server) och databaser (MSSQL), såsom installation, uppgradering, patchning och drift.
  
Ska ha minst ett (1) uppdrag med erfarenhet av att ansvara för att skapa, uppdatera och strukturera teknisk dokumentation och operativa processbeskrivningar.
  
  

Minst tre (3) års dokumenterad erfarenhet av att självständigt hantera felsökning av problem inom passersystem och agera som teknisk kontakt/ expert för interna och/eller externa användare och leverantörer.
  
Minst tre (3) års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med informations- och IT-säkerhet där arbete inkluderat genomförande av gapanalyser utifrån fastställda IT-säkerhetskrav och identifiering av åtgärder för att uppfylla dessa krav.
  
  

**Meriterande:**  

Minst två (2) års erfarenhet av arbete med eller mot offentlig sektor/myndighet.
  
Minst ett (1) uppdrag som innefattat samverkan mellan beställare och leverantör. Erfarenheten ska inkludera beställning och upphandling enligt LOU/LUF mot externa driftsleverantörer
  
Minst ett (1) uppdrag med erfarenhet av fakturahantering, budget, prognos samt ekonomisk uppföljning av externa leverantörer i ekonomisystem eller motsvarande kunskap och erfarenhet inom ekonomisk uppföljning.
  
Erfarenhet av projektering, praktiskt arbete med installation och konfiguration av hårdvara och firmware kopplat till passersystem.
  
  

**Omfattning & Villkor:**  

Detta är en visstidsanställning på heltid under perioden 12-jan-2026 - 10-jan-2027, hos NXT Interim Stockholm AB. Uppdraget möjliggör för närvarande både arbete på distans och på plats på kontoret hos oss eller vår kund på Kungsholmen i Stockholm. Dagar och tider för detta styrs efter behov i organisationen och efter beställarens godkännande
  
40 h per vecka och med option på förlängning.
  
Vi tillämpar kollektivavtal.
  
Vi tar ej emot underkonsulter på detta uppdrag.
  
  

Låter detta som en intressant roll?
  
Sök redan i dag eller kontakta oss så berättar vi gärna mer. Vi behöver en ansökan inkluderat CV på svenska som matchar vår kunds krav. Kunden kan fatta beslut tidigare än sista ansökningsdatum, urval och intervjuer sker löpande. NXT Interim och NXT Rekrytering är ett nischat och innovativt företag som är verksamma inom konsult och rekryteringsbranschen. Vi är verksamma inom HR, IT, Ekonomi, Sälj och Marknad och har över 20 års erfarenhet i branschen. Vi erbjuder våra konsulter bl.a sjukförsäkring, remote-arbetsplatser och flera andra förmåner som förgyller deras vardag. Vid anställning tillämpar vi kollektivavtal.

title: Konsult, Informationssäkerhet och IT-rätt
description:
Konsult inom Informationssäkerhet & IT-rätt (ISO 27001, GDPR, NIS2)
  
Qbase – Stockholm
  
Vill du arbeta i ett växande och dynamiskt bolag där informationssäkerhet, teknik och modern compliance möts? Qbase stärker nu sitt team och söker en konsult med kompetens inom informationssäkerhet och IT-rätt, gärna med erfarenhet av ISO 27001, GDPR, NIS2 och annan regulatorisk efterlevnad.
  
Om rollen
  
Som konsult hos oss kommer du att arbeta med kunder i olika branscher och hjälpa dem att utveckla sitt arbete inom informationssäkerhet och dataskydd. Rollen innebär både operativt och strategiskt arbete, där du stöttar organisationer i att bygga, förbättra och implementera ledningssystem och juridiska strukturer.
  
  

**Du kommer bland annat att:**  

Genomföra nulägesanalyser och riskbedömningar inom informationssäkerhet och dataskydd
  
Utveckla och implementera processer, policyer och rutiner enligt ISO 27001
  
Stötta kunder med efterlevnad av GDPR, NIS2, DORA och annan relevant lagstiftning
  
Genomföra workshops, utbildningar och revisioner
  
Arbeta med kundprojekt, avtal och återkommande rådgivning
  
Bidra till utvecklingen av Qbase egna metodik, tjänster och lösningar
  
  

Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet inom informationssäkerhet, IT-juridik eller compliance, gärna från konsultvärlden eller liknande rådgivande roller. Du behöver inte vara expert på allt, men du bör ha god förståelse för informationssäkerhet och vilja att utvecklas vidare inom området.
  
  

**Vi tror att du har:**  

Erfarenhet av ISO 27001 eller annat säkerhetsramverk
  
Kunskap om GDPR och relaterade dataskyddsfrågor
  
Intresse för (eller erfarenhet av) NIS2, DORA och cybersäkerhet
  
God förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift
  
Förmåga att bygga förtroende och skapa långsiktiga relationer med kunder
  
Analytisk, strukturerad och lösningsorienterad arbetsstil

title: Customer Care Coordinator
description:
***Karo Healthcare***
*, a dynamic and growing personal-care retail company, is all about making smart choices for everyday healthcare. With a wide-ranging portfolio across seven categories including medical products, we own and sell over 80 brands in about 90 countries. Our portfolio includes such brands as E45, Pevaryl, Lamisil, Nutravita, Decubal and many others. Our core belief in empowering people to make intelligent health decisions drives our growth strategy, blending organic expansion and M&A.*




 Join us at Karo Healthcare on our exciting journey. We're currently looking for a
 **Customer Care Coordinator** 
 for our office in
 **Stockholm** 
 .
   




**What's in it for you?**

**Be at the heart of our customer operations, in a hands-on role with real impact.**
 You'll join an agile, international company in growth mode—where your work shapes the daily experience of our customers and retail partners across the Nordics. Expect collaboration across borders, exposure to multiple business functions, and the chance to grow your career in a fast-paced, purpose-driven environment.
   




**What you'll be doing**
* Be the go-to contact for our pharmacy and retail customers in the Nordics—resolving order-related questions and ensuring timely communication.
* Monitor orders and coordinate with internal teams to ensure smooth, on-time deliveries.
* Send order confirmations and manage inquiries with precision and speed.
* Proactively communicate stock availability, delivery delays, and provide solutions.
* Work closely with supply chain, logistics, and commercial teams to remove roadblocks and boost customer satisfaction.
* Handle complex inquiries and escalations with a structured, customer-first approach.
* Log and follow up on customer cases, supporting ongoing improvement efforts.
* Support customer-specific processes including campaigns, promotional deliveries, and tailored reporting.
* Share customer insights internally to help improve product availability and service levels
  

  


**Requirements**
**Requirements**
* 2-3 years of experience in customer service, order management, or supply chain—ideally from a fast-moving, product-driven environment.
* Comfortable navigating ERP systems (IFS, SAP, Navision, or similar).
* Fluent in both
 **English and Swedish** 
 .
* Confident using
 **Excel and Outlook** 
 as daily tools.
* Previous experience in
 **FMCG, healthcare, or pharma** 
 is a strong plus.
* You're structured, solutions-focused, and enjoy working with multiple stakeholders to deliver results.
  

  


**Benefits**
* Opportunity to create, grow, and encourage
* Apart from a competitive salary pack, there are lots of growth opportunities to meet your personal ambitions
* Flexible schedule, hybrid model with the primary work place in the office, and life-work balance
* Responsibility for exciting and challenging projects that have a direct, visible impact on our customers and the industry
* Very positive work environment in a dynamic, international, and motivated team
* Start-up spirit while being a part of the large international organization with strong values



  
 



   
 



*Karo Healthcare has a Diverse & Inclusive environment. We are looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, race, religion, national origin, disability or age.*

title: Junior Analyst/Fact-finder (student job 10 h/week)
description:
**Fact Finder (Junior Analyst) [Student job!]** 




 We are seeking several fact finders and junior analysts for part-time - 10 hours/week - at our Stockholm office at Norra Djugården, close to Stockholm University, to support our management and development team in the Nordics. The position is at our office in Stockholm. It is neither from home, nor hybrid. Position starts in January 2026.
 



  





**About You** 




 You are fascinated with markets. You love data and empirical analysis. You are determined. You believe in evidence as a foundation for rational decision-making.
 



  





**Tasks** 




 As a fact-finder/junior analyst you will assist our management and development team collecting and presenting data relating to market conditions, including regulation/incentives, potential customers, competitors, suppliers as well as input markets/technologies.
 



  





**Profile** 




 You have an analytical and productive mind with strong skills in empirical research. You are studying for a Master's Degree in Engineering, Economics, Econometrics, Data Science and/or Statistics. You have excellent academic results. We think you are a student at Stockholm University, KTH, Uppsala University or Stockholm School of Economics. You are fluent in Swedish and you are proficient in English.
 



  





**Benefits** 




 A great scale-up experience and a competitive salary.
 



  





**Apply** 




 We evaluate applications continuously. Apply as soon as possible. Last day to apply is Friday December 12, 2025. We look forward to your application!
 



  





**About Primrock** 




 Primrock is the leading independent provider of balance and capacity services to the Nordic electricity system. We operate decentralized units supplying adequate power with highest possible reliability, precision and speed. Our facilities meet the need for reserve capacity to maintain stability in the Nordic synchronous system as well as power flexibility and quality at the local level. Our independence allows us to bring novel, efficient and user centric solutions to the market. We create value with an innovative multi functional and responsive design and business model. Primrock supports the expansion of renewable power generation by providing capacity that can be used as synthetic inertia and for frequency restoration after grid disturbances. In addition, our capacity services facilitate the electrification of new sectors, notably by enabling a rapid introduction of electric vehicles.

title: Senior Solutions Consultant
description:
**Meet Our Team**
 As a senior contributor to the Pega Sales Consulting team, you will collaborate with client executives, product managers, software developers, analysts, business officers, and other groups to ensure the successful execution of sales strategy with key enterprise clients. Our senior solutions consultants combine solid technical sophistication with extensive enterprise knowledge and customer centricity!
   

  

**Picture Yourself At Pega**
 Pega's powerful portfolio of strategic AI-driven applications helps our fortune 500 clients embrace digital transformation, by automating business critical processes including AI powered personalization.
   

  

**What You'll Do At Pega**
* Lead complex technical presentations and solution architecture discussions with stakeholders at various organizational levels including C-level executives and senior IT leaders
* Design and deliver sophisticated product demonstrations showcasing Pega's capabilities across work flow automation
* Help our fortune 500 enterprises achieve strategic business goals by streamlining mission-critical operations
* Analyze complex challenges and evaluate how Pega's technology can drive meaningful business value and significant ROI


**Who You Are**
 Passionate about digital transformation through cutting edge technology! You bring senior-level technical expertise combined with client-facing pre-sales and consulting roles. You are a driven, autonomous team player who thrives among high performing colleagues, utilizing the latest technology and best practice.
   

  

* Strategic thought leader with proven ability to design and present complex solution architectures , combined with executive-level communication skills to build relationships with senior stakeholders across business and IT
* Would be great if you have experience in financial services software implementations, solution architecture, regulatory compliance systems, and enterprise transformation projects within financial services and insurance
* Background in diverse SAP environments-from BTP and ECC to S/4HANA and other enterprise level solutions-covering different domains and processes would also be advantageous


**What You've Accomplished**

* Delivered comprehensive POCs and executive-level demonstrations showcasing complex solutions, and educated C-suite customers on transformational capabilities
* 8+ years of thought leadership in technology and digital transformation
* 8+ years of hands-on experience developing, selling, and implementing enterprise software solutions ideally within the financial services sector

**Pega Offers You**
* Gartner Analyst acclaimed technology leadership across our categories of products
* Continuous learning and development opportunities
* An innovative, inclusive, agile, flexible, and fun work environment
* Competitive global benefits program inclusive of pay + bonus incentive, employee equity in the company

title: Junior Project Manager
description:
*Primrock is looking for an ambitious junior/assisting project manager for our upcoming battery energy systems and power generation sites.* 




  





**About the role as Junior Project Manager** 




  





 As a junior (assisting) project manager, you assist the project management with the preparation and implementation of our new construction projects. You assist the project management both administratively and practically. Among other things, you work with creating, supplementing, communicating and following up on project documentation and project plans. You participate in coordination and dialogue with stakeholders, authorities and suppliers. You assist with procurement and ordering. You establish and follow up control programs. You compile and report ongoing project costs in relation to the budget. You prepare, document and follow up project meetings etc.
 



  





**About you** 




  





 You are a relatively recent graduate with a Master's degree or equivalent, preferably in Engineering or Industrial Economics or a combination of Economics/Business Administration/Engineering, with excellent results. You are structured and responsible. Your language skills include the ability to express yourself professionally in speech and writing in both Swedish and English. We work with advanced written sources, so your ability to digest and understand facts and knowledge of a technical, financial and regulatory nature in both Swedish and English is a necessity.
 



  





**About Primrock** 




  





 Primrock provides capacity and balance services to the Nordic electricity market. We are a fast-growing and customer-focused company on the edge of the evolving power system in Sweden. We offer system operators and end-users flexible, reliable, and cost-efficient capacity-as-a-service. We strive to facilitate the transition to a 100% renewable power system by providing distributed solutions as a complement to intermittent, weather-dependent, generation.
 



  





**About the job** 




  





 The position is full time (100%) - in office. It is neither from home, nor hybrid. Primrock offers a competitive compensation package. Our office is located at Norra Djurgården, in proximity of Stockholm University. The position will start in January 2026 (or February at the latest).
 



  





**Apply** 




  





 We evaluate candidates continuously. Deadline for applications is 6:00 pm (CET) on Friday 12 December 2025. We look forward to your application!

title: Chief Project Officer
description:
*Primrock is seeking a Chief Project Officer (CPO) to head our engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) team for new utility-scale balancing systems – particularly large scale battery energy storage systems – in Sweden.* 




**About Primrock** 




 Primrock provides capacity and balance services to the Nordic electricity market. We are a Stockholm-based fast-growing company on the edge of the evolving power system in Sweden. Primrock designs, builds, owns and operates physical assets (mainly large scale battery energy storage systems) to provide multiple critical services to the electricity market and Nordic synchronous power system. The engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) team is responsible for delivering turn-key installations after commissioning to Primrock’s Operations in accordance with our plan to expand capacity. The EPC-team execute projects approved by the Board. The EPC-team works closely with the project development team that identifies and prepares new sites.
 



**About the role** 




 The Chief Project Officer (CPO) of Primrock will have three main resposibilities. First, you will execute Primrock’s epansion plan for new capacity through multiple parallel large-scale installation projects. Second, you will head the engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) team to deliver turn-key systems within budget, on time and in accordance with specifications. Third, you will support individual projects with expertise and guidance including engineering for project-specific requirements, site-specific procurement as well as the execution of quality control programs. The CPO reports to the Chief Operating Officer (COO).
 



**Your profile** 




 You have a Master’s degree in Civil Engineering from a top university (e.g. KTH, LTH, Chalmers) with excellent academic results. You have 2+ years of professional experience from engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) in a leading role. You have extensive experience of project management. Experience from large scale investment projects in manufacturing and/or energy is a plus but not a requirement. You have excellent oral and written communication skills in Swedish and English.
 



**About the job** 




 The position is full time (100%) at our office in Stockholm. It is not from home and not hybrid. Primrock offers a competitive compensation package. The position will start preferably in January and no later than February 2026.
 



**Application** 




 Application deadline for this job is
 
 Friday 12 December 2025 at 6:00 pm (CET)
 
 . We look forward to your application!

title: Head of Service Delivery
description:
**Job Description**
 Welcome to SSC – Swedish Space Corporation, the perfect workplace for those passionate about technology in general and space in particular.
   

  

 Our services enable successful space projects in telecommunications, security, meteorology, positioning, research, earth observation, and other applications. With space organizations, research institutes, institutional and commercial actors as customers, we offer specialist expertise in satellite communications, ground station services, space consulting services, rocket and balloon systems, flight test services and much more.
   

  

**Are you fueled by a passion for people and the ambition to create an awesome workplace?**
**Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey with us to help Earth benefit from space?** 
  

  

 If you answer yes to these questions, we invite you to seize the opportunity to make a significant impact as
 **Head of** 
**Service Delivery** 
 in our Service Delivery team. We are looking for a dedicated manager who shares our core values of Customer passion, Care, Collaboration, Curiosity, and Courage.
   

  

 SSC’s Connect division provides Ground Station as a Service (GSaaS) solutions to the global space industry. We support our customers in monitoring and controlling their spacecraft and downloading satellite data. We are looking for a manager to run our global Service Delivery department and ensure that we deliver our services according to budget and customer requirements. You will have the opportunity to be involved in all aspects of our GSaaS business and will play an important part in interacting with our customers and supporting the company to grow on the global market. Our international teams work across different geographical locations and time zones.
   

  

**This Is Service Delivery**
* Service Commissioning: This involves the initial setup and configuration of services to ensure they meet customer specifications. The team works closely with customers during the commissioning of new services and provide technical support for on-orbit services
* Service Assurance: The department is responsible for maintaining the quality and reliability of services. This includes ongoing monitoring and support to ensure that services are delivered as promised and any issues are promptly addressed
* LEOP (Launch and Early Orbit Phase): The Service Delivery department handles critical operations e.g. Launch and Early Orbit Phase, which includes setup, testing, execution, and training for non-critical phases. They ensure that all operations are conducted smoothly and efficiently
* Project Management: The department manages various projects, from complex missions requiring extensive project management to standard services with minimal oversight. They focus on risk management, milestone adherence, and keeping stakeholders updated on project status
* Customer Engagement: The team engages with customers throughout the service delivery process, from sales to ongoing support. They maintain and develop technical knowledge and skills to provide high-quality service and address any operational inquiries or issues
* Technical Expertise: The department provides technical and project management expertise to customer projects, including configuring systems for new missions, performing pre-launch testing, and supporting critical operations.


**Job Requirements**
**YOUR ROLE** 
  

  

**The Main Tasks Of The Role Are**
* Manage the teams and ensure adherence to applicable processes and routines.
* Foster a motivating environment that encourages team engagement and alignment towards achieving shared goals.
* Support the organization in managing assignments and projects and applying best practices.
* Support organization in identifying risks, and implementing strategies and actions to mitigate them, safeguarding project success.
* Support the organization in developing training documentation and ensure efficient on-boarding of new employees.
* Promptly inform Connect’s Executive team of project delivery issues and customer escalations.
* Engage with customers to manage expectations and ensure customer satisfaction.
* Manage cross-functional collaboration by coordinating tasks and projects with other teams, including software development and IT teams.
* Being an active member of the Connect Executive Team, contributing to the divisions Business strategy, prioritizations, and developing and maintaining a shared organizational culture.


**Job Responsibilities**
**WHO YOU ARE** 
  

  

 You have a bachelor’s or master’s degree in science or engineering. You have proven experience in managing customers and service contracts for technology-focused services and have extensive project management experience. Additionally, you have a strong commercial understanding including experience in budget management. People management comes naturally to you, and you are experienced in managing engineering teams.
   

  

**Your Expertise Includes**
* Demonstrates a strong sense of responsibility by overseeing the entire lifecycle of team deliverables, ensuring reliability and fostering cooperation to achieve project goals.
* Demonstrates a strong commitment to understanding and meeting customer needs, building long-term, trust-based relationships.
* Good ability to grasp complex technical systems and good analytical skills to find solutions to complex problems.
* Well-structured, ambitious and driven, with a proactive approach to project management.
* Self-driven and capable of working autonomously.
* Good cultural understanding and a strong track record of managing distributed teams across time zones.
* Willing to travel frequently.


**Valuable additions**
* Experience in the space business, for example spacecraft and/or ground segment operations.


**Job Benefits**
 WE OFFER YOU
   

  

* A unique opportunity to contribute to a wide range of projects and play an active role in both the Swedish and international space industry.
* An excellent opportunity for personal and career development.
* An exciting, international workplace characterized by an open atmosphere and proud employees all over the world.


**Additional Benefits (applies In Sweden)**
* In addition to vacation and traditional public holidays, we offer extra paid leave throughout the year, such as time off between Christmas and New Year, Ascension Day, amounting to 6-11 extra days depending on the calendar.
* Wellness allowance of SEK 5,000 per year.
* Health benefits such as voluntary health insurance and regular health checks for eligeble employees.
* Access to a benefit bike through a tax-efficient leasing program.
* Support for employee-driven activities that promote connection, health, and culture across teams.
* Collective Agreement, including good pensions plans, parental pay and insurance.


**LOCATION** 
  

  

 This is a permanent position with 40 hours/week, located at any of our SSC offices, with a preference for the Solna location.
   

  

  

  

**NEXT STEP** 
  

  

 If this opportunity sparks your interest, don’t wait—apply today! We will review applications on an ongoing basis, and interviews will be conducted continuously.
   

  

 We kindly ask that you only submit your CV when applying. By focusing solely on CVs, we can ensure a fair and efficient recruitment process that allows us to evaluate your skills and qualifications directly.
   

  

 Please note that the job advertisement may close earlier than the stated deadline if we receive a high volume of applications. This allows us to ensure a fair and efficient recruitment process and give each application the attention it deserves.
   

  

 This is a security-classified position and will require a background check prior to employment.
   

  

 We welcome your application no later than
 **2025-09-30.**
**WE HELP EARTH BENEFIT FROM SPACE**
 Swedish Space Corporation (SSC) is a leading global provider of advanced space services, with more than 50 years of experience. We help space organizations, research institutes, commercial and institutional actors from all over the world to get access to space.
   

  

 With local presence on all continents and about 700 committed employees, we offer specialist expertise in ground station services, spacecraft operations, rocket and balloon systems, launch services and flight test services, as well as engineering, operations and consultancy services for space missions.
   

  

 We help Earth benefit from Space.

title: Senior Account Executive
description:
Automat-it is where high-growth startups turn when they need to move faster, scale smarter, and make the most of the cloud. As an AWS Premier Partner and Strategic Partner, we deliver hands-on DevOps and FinOps and GenAI support that drives real results.
 



  





 We work across EMEA and the US, fueling innovation and solving complex challenges daily. Join us to grow your skills, shape bold ideas, and help build the future of tech.
 



  





 We’re seeking an Account Executive to drive Automat-it business growth in the EMEA north territory of Greenfield accounts while assuring a great customer experience. You’ll be responsible for the sales process, from prospecting to closing a deal. 
 



 📍 Work location - hybrid from Stockholm with weekly visits to AWS office
 



 If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your CV in English.
 



  

  




 Responsibilities:
 
  




* Develop and execute successful targeted territory development plans to help achieve or exceed growth, revenue, and margin targets
* Develop and manage all phases of the territory’s business development cycle, including managing proposal negotiations, the statement-of-work, and completion of all contract details
* Demonstrates breadth and depth of knowledge in aligning Automat-it capabilities to client business and positioning relative to competitors
* Prospect new customers and communicate with the AWS reps regularly
* Maintain and develop strategic vendor relations with AWS
* Regularly attend business events to promote and educate prospective clients on the benefits of Automat-it
* Work collaboratively with Marketing, Operations, Delivery, and Solutions Architects
* Commitment to regular business travel locally and abroad



  

  




 Requirements:
 
  




* 2+ years of experience in direct IT sales and business development from a complex cloud or software solutions
* Experience selling IT professional services (consulting/managed/staff services) or SaaS solutions designed for R&D or DevOps teams
* Ability to articulate the value proposition of professional services to technical and business stakeholders
* Proven successful track record of meeting and exceeding sales quotas
* Experience with selling AWS-based solutions
* Network and relationships with Swedish-based digital native/ISV/startup companies
* Demonstrated ability to engage and influence C-level executives
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both English and Swedish
* Excellent presentation and organizational skills
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
* Working experience with Salesforce or Hubspot
* AWS cloud certificated - advantage



 Automat-it is committed to fostering a workplace that promotes equal opportunities for all and believes that a diverse workforce is crucial to our success. Our recruitment decisions are based on your experience and skills, recognizing the value you bring to our team.
 







  

  




 Benefits:
 
  




* Professional training and certifications covered by the company (AWS, FinOps, Kubernetes, etc.)
* International work environment
* Referral program – enjoy cooperation with your colleagues and get a bonus
* Company events and social gatherings (happy hours, team events, knowledge sharing, etc.)
* English classes
* Soft skills training



 Country-specific benefits will be discussed during the hiring process.
 



 Automat-it is committed to fostering a workplace that promotes equal opportunities for all and believes that a diverse workforce is crucial to our success. Our recruitment decisions are based on your experience and skills, recognizing the value you bring to our team.

title: SEO Intern
description:
📍 Stockholm
   

  

 📆 LIA 2
   

  

 👩🏽‍💻 Office: 3 Days a Week
   

  

 🧑‍🎓 Student Site
   

  

 We are looking for interns who are eager to learn the ropes of digital marketing – with the goal of making a long career at Precis!
   

  

**This role is aimed at bachelor's or master's degree students who have an internship period included in their study program. It’s a full-time internship.**
 Your main focus is to learn within your role and help your team. Responsibilities, main goals, and development criteria are focused on gaining knowledge and contributing to Precis by utilising your knowledge to impact your clients and your team. Your role will be to assist a team of experienced marketing professionals in a variety of different digital marketing projects.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**

**What We Offer**

We believe that a diverse set of minds will continue to contribute to our innovative culture and our ability to reinvent ourselves constantly.*
***Please send your application in English. We will get in touch via email, so please make sure to check your spam folder.***

title: AI Systems Engineer
description:
**Introducing evroc**
 At evroc, we are building a secure, sovereign, and sustainable hyperscale cloud to reimagine the digital future of Europe. By joining our company, you have an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of next-generation cloud services. We are seeking intellectually curious and highly motivated team members who are ready to embrace the thrilling challenge of building the first European owned hyperscale cloud.
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Job type:** 
 Permanent position
   

  

**Join the Pioneers**
 This is a rare opportunity to influence the technical foundation of a European hyperscaler— at the very beginning.
   

  

 As an AI Systems Engineer at evroc, you will be at the center of developing and operating our AI platform services, providing evroc’s customers/users with a superior experience, ranging from inference-as-a-service to infrastructure for large-scale training.
   

  

 Working with the latest Nvidia GPU hardware and open-source AI technologies, you’ll ensure our platform is secure, resource efficient, and performant. evroc's AI services bring European sovereignty, data privacy, and sustainability to AI application developers.
   

  

 You will work in close collaboration with infrastructure, platform, and storage teams, across our development hubs in Stockholm, Sophia Antipolis (France), and London.
   

  

**What You’ll Tackle**
* Designing, building, and maintaining a production platform for AI inference and training, based on Kubernetes.
* Implementing multi-tenancy in GPU-accelerated platforms, ensuring efficient resource sharing, workload isolation, and scheduling.
* Optimizing resource utilization and performance of AI inference and training workloads.
* Monitoring and metrics collection for real-time control and accounting.
* Security in all aspects, from user authentication to GPU attestation.


**Skills We Value**
* Operating system fundamentals, e.g., containerization, virtualization, and device drivers, including SR-IOV and RDMA.
* Operational experience with Kubernetes.
* GPU low-level software stack, e.g., Nvidia CUDA, MIG, GPU Operator, DCGM, and GPU interconnect software.
* AI/ML frameworks and runtimes, e.g., vLLM and PyTorch.
* Distributed systems fundamentals, including networking, scheduling, and resource allocation.
* Software development in programming languages such as Golang, Rust, and Python.
* Security technologies, e.g. TPM, TEE, and Confidential Computing.
* Strong problem-solving and communication skills to effectively address complex platform engineering challenges.


 We offer a competitive salary and an equity package to attract the best. Whether it’s the cosmopolitan allure of London, the vibrant Stockholm, or the Mediterranean charm of Sophia Antipolis, you’re poised for an inspiring work environment and a captivating local culture!
   

  

 At evroc, diversity is our strength. We champion an inclusive environment where every background - ethnicity, age, gender identity, beliefs, and culture - is celebrated.
   

  

 Applicants must possess a valid work permit.

title: HR Generalist - EMEA
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1200+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder led, profitable and growing.
   

  

**We are hiring an HR Generalist to support our EMEA region**
 With 1,200+ colleagues across 75 countries, we require an HR function that thinks and acts globally. We're looking for an HR Generalist who will report into our Regional HR Manager who can help build our company as we go through continued growth plans. It's an exciting time to join with the opportunity to help shape and create an HR function for the future. You will demonstrate a high work ethic and the personal confidence to set and defend high expectations of colleagues, counterparts and processes. You must be able to work independently, take a hands-on approach, and interface effectively with professionals at all levels. You'll need excellent communication, professional and interpersonal skills as well as the ability to function in a proactive, innovative environment. We look to HR both to support our colleagues in their personal needs and development, and also to maintain consistently high standards across multiple teams, managers and directors.
   

  

**The role entails the individual to:**
* Provide HR guidance to team members and managers, setting high expectations of behaviour and performance.
* Partner with line managers to provide employee relations advice on global policies and procedures.
* Ensure accuracy and timeliness in processing employee changes, joiners and leavers.
* Manage and drive benefit programs spanning our EMEA location (UK, Ireland, France, Germany and Spain)
* Liaise with our finance team on monthly payroll, projects and enquiries.
* Support the full life-cycle of HR including onboarding, benefit administration, and departure.
* Apply critical thinking to automate and reduce administrative tasks.
* Take a lead role in the management, continued development, and integration of our HR
* system.
* Act as a system expert and advocate for the global HR team.
* Produce data driven reports to inform and influence HR initiatives.
* Lead and participate in projects where you'll see the impact of your work.
* Support internal resource groups to drive initiatives such as diversity and inclusion.
* Create, update and maintain corporate policies that have a global lens with local application.
* Ensure consistency of application of our HR policies and procedures.


**What we are looking for in you:**
* Exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
* Relevant professional qualification and certifications.
* Excellent practical insights into German, UK and/or French HR practices and employment laws.
* Knowledge of other EMEA laws and practices is beneficial.
* Self-directed, organised problem solver with the ability to prioritise and meet goals and deadlines.
* Demonstrated ability to exercise discretion, sound judgement, tact and diplomacy in all communications.
* Fearless and principled approach to professional interactions at every level of the business with commitment to confidentiality of sensitive information.
* Willingness and ability to travel up to 4 times a year for internal events, with at least one trip of two full working weeks.


**What we offer colleagues**
 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person.
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year.
* Annual compensation review.
* Recognition rewards.
* Annual holiday leave.
* Maternity and paternity leave.
* Employee Assistance Programme.
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues.
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events.


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Senior Channel & Alliance Manager
description:
*Aceve is in business to back the builders of society.* 
**We are the SaaS powerhouse, built by engineers, developers, salespeople, administrators, marketeers, controllers, and much more**
*. With over 500 employees, more than 950 million SEK in revenue and extensive experience in the field, we combine tradition and tech to provide a pioneering platform that helps our customers to achieve more.*
**Role Overview**
 Aceve is seeking two highly motivated and very experienced Senior Channel & Alliances Managers to drive business growth and strengthen our market presence across Europe. These roles will focus on building strategic partnerships, while executing tailored sales and marketing initiatives to achieve revenue and market share goals. Close collaboration cross country and cross-functional teams is required to ensure brand consistency and effective go-to-market execution.
   

  

 These roles will focus on building strategic partnerships with regional distributors, technology & thought leaders, horizontal solutions and/or regional Sis, to drive market penetration in the diverse and highly competitive European market environment. This will include both help accelerate existing partners as well as recruit new ones that support Aceve Partnerships strategy.
   

  

 We are seeking for one person to be based in Copenhagen and one in Stockholm.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and expand Aceve distributor channels (covering major markets such as Nordics, DACH and Benelux) to achieve high market coverage for our portfolio, including building a plan for which part(s) of the portfolio to work with per territory(ies) to maximize Aceve growth, based on your market and competitor knowledge and in close collaboration with our Product & Technology Teams.
* Ensure Aceve´s constant market share and visibility growth in the territory(ies) with new and upsell opportunities, across existing and new Customer segments, both via Aceve portfolio and via technology alliances with domain specific leaders.
* Strategic Partnership Development by Identifying, recruiting and onboarding new Partners & alliances aligned with Aceve´s GTM strategy, such as regional/pan-European Sis, IT Managed Services providers, Accountants, Financial System vendors, Unions, employee organizations, regulatory bodies, industry leaders and similar.Partner Portfolio Management incl. joint business planning, Exec QBRs, and recommendations for territory assignments, incentive structures and/or engagement models’ optimisation to achieve the 1+1=3 effect.
* Manage the partners’ relationships, owning executive-level relationships and executing strategically important joint initiatives aligned with the territory(ies) strategy, in close collaboration with our Product & Marketing teams. This includes understand the competitive landscape to ensure Aceve remains a ‘partner-of-choice’ and proactively present recommendations of how to stimulate business growth
* Build and/or grow your reputation as an industry expert and establish relationships with potential partners and key decision-makers in the industry, attend industry events and present the benefits of the Aceve portfolio where required. Serve as a regional expert while keeping in mind our pan-European footprint.


**Qualifications & Skills**
* 10+ years' experience in sales/ indirect/ channel partnerships in B2B SW (B2SMB is a plus), out of which 5+ years have been on a partnership role
* Used to work under high levels of productivity and work well with constant change, fast-paced environments, and the ambiguity of a high growth business environment supported by an established HQ team.
* Excellent cross-cultural communication skills, being able to connect with people at all levels of the organization, including executive team and/or the board, meeting and exceeding your stakeholders’ expectations (both internal and external stakeholders)
* Strong negotiation skills – to navigate complex commercial discussions to ensure the best outcome for both parties to nurture long-term relationships.
* Startup mindset: strategic thinking with hands-on execution capability, adaptable, proactive and ready to wear multiple hats. Organised self-started, capable of designing scalable new initiatives.
* Thriving in a fast-paced high-growth environment. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills and innovative ways to approach new challenges
* Collaborative nature. High energy level, resilience and able to juggle among several open items and priorities without losing the smile.
* Social mastery, comfortable with travelling to partner or customers sites and industry events, and creating brand new relationships
* Analytical and data-driven, able to go from strategic tasks like researching a new market to daily systems hygiene like keeping the prospective partners and partners defined in our CRM (preferably Salesforce) and PRM systems (Impartner, kiflo, Allbound etc)
* Experience in Construction, Heavy Machinery and/or skilled trades, Accounting, Bookkeeping, SMB/Mid-Market ERP, and your own network of partners and/or experts that you have worked with over the years in the industry is a strong-plus.
* Professsional Fluency in English and the local language are a must


**Not ticking every box?** 
 No worries! We value potential and drive, so apply anyway or connect with us- you might be just what we're looking for in our growing organisation! Join Aceve and take your expertise to the next level, together we are redefining what’s possible in craft and construction solutions!
   

  

*Aceve is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Our selection process is conducted continuously and without discrimination, ensuring an equal opportunity for all candidates.*
 Aceve is in business to back the builders of society. With over 500 employees, 100 million € in revenue and extensive experience in the field, we combine tradition and tech to provide a pioneering platform that helps our customers to achieve more.
